Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.0162
Sheep.Message: I can't tell if the documents on the terminals are all that's left from a larger archive, or are carefully designed to communicate some hidden truth.

Related.Author: Sheep v69.1.0162
Related.Message: I can't tell if the documents on the terminals are all that's left from a larger archive, or are carefully designed to communicate some hidden truth.

1w/Faith.Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.233
1w/Faith.Message: Whenever I despair, I remind myself that at the end of this great pilgrimage lies life in the eternal memory of the Designer. I need no further motivation.

Related.Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.233
Related.Message: Whenever I despair, I remind myself that at the end of this great pilgrimage lies life in the eternal memory of the Designer. I need no further motivation.

Related.Author: @ v17.1.0005
Related.Message: A lifetime spent solving the puzzles in this place would be one which missed everything of value in it; but we must remember that others will tread this path, and we must leave it better signposted than when we found it.

@.Author: @ v17.1.0005

@.Author: @ v17.1.0054
@.Message: I don't know where I am, but there is something beautiful about this place. I will explore and see what I can discover.

Related.Author: @ v17.1.0054

Uriel4.Author: Uriel4 v48.2.1073f
Uriel4.Location: Main World, star area, if scanned with reader
Uriel4.Message: There are secrets everywhere, sometimes within our very words. I glimpse them, but my eyes cannot read them. How can this be?

Related.Author: Uriel4 v48.2.1073f
